statements: DELETE FROM KYC_Compliance WHERE customer_id = 101 AND kyc_status = 'Pending';
DELETE FROM KYC_Compliance WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%' OR customer_address LIKE '%Street%';
DELETE FROM kyc_information WHERE customer_id = 100 AND kyc_status = TRUE;
DELETE FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = FALSE AND customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM kyc_information WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01');
DELETE FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = false;
DELETE FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = FALSE AND record_date < '2022-01-01';
